summary: Added a new race which is a mixture of all the positive traits in the game.
descriptionHtml:
Added a new race which is a mixture of all the positive traits in the game.
Fire and frost resistance <25>%
Magic resistance <50>%
DovahKiin Luck <imperial luck renamed>
Dovahkiin Lungs <Waterbreathing>
And they have the best powers in the game, making them a hybrid race which combines all the races in the game.
This is my first mod, and im not really that gifted, hope you like it :)
Speech        10
Restoration  10
Destruction  10
Illusion         10
Marksman     10
Conjuration  10 
Base carryweight (starting carry weight) : 500

My email is : gunsking1@hotmail.com
please tell me if there are any bugs, thanks :)

Changelog : 
1.0 : Official release.
1.1 : Fire frost resistance fixed, and red, purple, and dark red hair colors added.
author: DarkHighBosmer

files.name: Dovahkiin Race 1dot1
files.changelogHtml:
Fire Frost resistance fixed.
Red, Purple, and dark red hair colors added,
